abstract: On Friday, cybersecurity experts said they had evidence of the first confirmed attack on a major corporation using the Heartbleed bug.
snippet: On Friday, cybersecurity experts said they had evidence of the first confirmed attack on a major corporation using the Heartbleed bug.
lead_paragraph: Within 24 hours of the Heartbleed bug’s disclosure last week, an attacker used it to break into a major corporation, security experts said Friday.

headline.main: Heartbleed Internet Security Flaw Used in Attack
headline.print_headline: Hackers Use Heartbleed to Hit ‘Major Corporation’
